description:
Apple TV Plus has been competing with other major streaming services like Netflix, Max, and Disney Plus. They’ve crafted their own variety of Apple TV Plus originals, some of which have become quite popular, and unfortunately one of them is revealed to have been cancelled. As shared in a new report, this particular series will [...]

The post Apple TV Plus Series Cancelled After Two Seasons appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Apple TV Plus Series Cancelled After Two Seasons
